faqs.question: Are there any specific building bylaws or height restrictions for plots in Sector 42
faqs.answer: Yes Sector 42 falls under the jurisdiction of Haryana Shahari Vikas Pradhikaran HSVP or Municipal Corporation Gurugram MCG depending on the specific block. Standard building bylaws typically allow for construction up to four floors plus a basement and stilt parking. Floor Area Ratio FAR limits are strictly enforced to maintain the quality of life and density of the area. It is crucial to consult a local architect familiar with the latest MCG rules specific to Sector 42 before submitting your construction plans for approval.
